message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept this and we can move on to the next round.
You started with an unfair offer, now it's time for a more reasonable one.

This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not going to get a better deal than this.

This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not getting any younger.
